body:
Thanks Greg, David and Andy for your replies.
Have run simulations with the glow material and find no significant
differences in sensor signal when having no subdivision compared to
different subdivisions. So I'll stick to the glow material for my window and
simulate without any window subdivision. Elegant ;-).


I have simply changed the window material from light to glow and set the
settings as recommended by Andy.


void glow windowlight
0
0
4 1 1 1 0


Best,
Anne
